@description.name: @description
@description.body: This interface defines the necessary features a form renderer should have. Keep in mind that all renderes has to be widgets.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a group of form items with the corresponding names. The names should be displayed as hint for the user what to do with the form item. The title is optional and can be used as grouping for the given form items.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: items {qx.ui.core.Widget[]} An array of form items to render.
@param.description: An array of form items to render.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: names {String[]} An array of names for the form items.
@param.description: An array of names for the form items.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: title {String?} A title of the group you are adding.
@param.description: A title of the group you are adding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
headerOptions {Map?null} The options map as defined by the form
   for the current group header.
@param.description:
The options map as defined by the form
   for the current group header.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
button {qx.ui.form.Button} A button which should be added to
   the form.
@param.description:
A button which should be added to
   the form.
